title: *One Month FREE* Two Car Garage & Private Yard at this Cozy Townhome!
posting_body: *After the 1 month free is SELF PRORATED*

Featuring a 2 car garage and only a 5 minute drive to the Hillside Galleria which features major brand-name shops, restaurants, a grocery store, and a movie theater for plenty of action without having to go very far!
Pet-Friendly community just minutes from Hamilton Greenbelt with pleanty of nearby hiking trails and a private yard for plenty of exploring with your furry friend!

Resort style community pool with outdoor kitchen and grill, a stylish community lounge, with easy access to the Falconhead Golf Club, watersport locations, and beautiful views, this Townhome provides an everyday vacation for residents.
The clubhouse offers a private conference room as well as a space to entertain your young ones with games and toys!
And located close by to the highly rated Lake Travis school district, offering an unmatched location, and a well-appointed maintenance-free lifestyle unlike any other.

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
